(I've been given permission by Yanshosh to create this post to dismiss false 
accusations that are very serious in my opinion and by not answering them I 
would seem guilty, when I just didn't want to get moderated.

First, I am not racist or prejudice in anyway.  I'm very, very against 
racism.  I think its ugly, and if someone is going to harass someone just 
because they believe in a different religion or because their skin is a 
different pigment than they've got to be messed up.

Anyway, over IM I told Dcoburn I was leaning towards atheism (the belief that 
there is no God/gods) and gave him reasons.  Atheism doesn't mean I think 
religion and everyone who is in it is bad.  Just means I don't believe in 
gods.  I don't necessarily think religion is good for society, but I don't 
think of people who believe in a religion any less. Hey, my mom was a 
Buddhist and my dad is a Christian.  I even go to church on Sunday 
occasionally.  I usually even go to youth group on Mondays.  For the social 
reasons and because my dad wants me to and I respect his wishes.

Dcoburn, your comments about me being "prejudice" are very insulting and I 
don't appreciate it.  I've never insulted someone because of their religion 
(well, if you don't count satanic cults as a religion), or insulted someone 
because of the color of their skin or heritage.  And I never will.


-Lord Unitron
